questions.question: 1. First line of FASTA Sequence has

answers.a: Starting with > symbol followed by the description or identifier of the sequence
answers.b: Starting with > symbol and description is optional
answers.c: Starting with '+'character and is optionally followed by the same sequence identifier
answers.d: Starting with @' character and is followed by a sequence identifier.

questions.question: 3. Identify the file formats having end of the sequence is marked by two slashes.

answers.c: European Molecular Biology and Biotechnology Laboratory
answers.d: European Molecular Biology and Bioinformatics Laboratory
